verses.name: Mark 4:25
verses.text: For he that hath, to him shall be given: and he that hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he hath.

verses.name: Mark 4:26
verses.text: And he said, So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should cast seed into the ground;

verses.name: Mark 4:27
verses.text: And should sleep, and rise night and day, and the seed should spring and grow up, he knoweth not how.

verses.name: Mark 4:28
verses.text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself; first the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.
